entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 01:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: WSW 69 km/h gust 86 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
